basics.name: Chia-Hsiang Kao
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: A Taiwanese medical doctor pursuing a Ph.D. in Computer Science.

work.name: Computer & Information Science, Cornell University
work.summary: Served as a teaching assistant for the 'Practicum in Artificial Intelligence' course, taught by Prof. Bart Selman.

education.institution: National Yang-Ming Chiao-Tung University, Taipei, Taiwan

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
